 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָזַם‎</span>] **verb** ==wink, flash== (of eyes) (transposed [textual error ?] for Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רְמַז‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; so Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָמַז‎</span> (rare), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֶמֶז‎</span> ***sign, intimation***); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּמַהיִּֿרְזְמוּן עֵינֶיךָ‎</span> [[Job.15.12|Job 15:12]] (Manuscripts <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ירמזון‎</span>) ***why do thine eyes flash*** (in wrath)? but possibly read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְרוּמוּן‎</span> ([[Prov.6.17|Prov 6:17]]; [[Prov.30.13|Prov 30:13]], etc., compare [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]).
